SeniorProject.DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi module¶

class DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.DrinkDetail(drinkDict)¶

Bases: object

Representation of the drinks and their information

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.ID_DETAIL_SEARCH_URL = 'https://www.thecocktaildb.com/api/json/v1/1/lookup.php?'¶

Format of results in returned JSON (some entries omitted): {idDrink, strDrink, strVideo, strCategory, strIBA, strAlcoholic, strGlass, strInstructions, strDrinkThumb, strIngredient1…2…3..etc, strMeasure1…2…3..etc}

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.INGREDIENT_SEARCH_URL = 'https://www.thecocktaildb.com/api/json/v1/1/filter.php?'¶

Format of results in returned JSON: {strDrink, strDrinkThumb, idDrink}

class DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.SearchResult(data)¶

Bases: object

Representation of the JSON object list received from the ingredient search api call

build_result(drink_id)¶
DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.find_matching_drinks(ingredient_list)¶

Find drinks that match input ingredients

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.find_recommended_drinks(ingredient_list)¶

Determine recommended drinks based on ingredients of another drink

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.get_drink_details(drink_id)¶

Return details of a drink from the api

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.idApiCall(id)¶

Return a JSON object containing a detailed drink info dictionary using a specific drink id

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.ingredientApiCall(ingredient)¶

Return a JSON object containing list of drink info dictionaries containing name, ID, and image using the input ingredient

DrinkBeyondThePossible.cocktaildbapi.searchMatchingDrinks(ingredient)¶

Returns a SearchResult containing drinks and their details that have ingredients matching the input

comment_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

SeniorProject.DrinkBeyondThePossible.tests module¶

class DrinkBeyondThePossible.tests.CocktailDBAPITest(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

test_drink_detail_creation()¶
class DrinkBeyondThePossible.tests.SearchResultsViewTest(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

test_invalid_search_entry()¶

If there are no valid drinks for the input search entries, the results view should load and say so

test_valid_search_entry()¶

If there are drinks for the input search entries, there should be results within the context to display

SeniorProject.DrinkBeyondThePossible.views module¶

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.createAccount(request)¶

Form page for creating a new account

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.detail(request, drinkID)¶

Detail page of a specific drink listing its rating, recipe, instructions, description, recommended drink, and comments

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.displayCustomDrinks(request, recipe_name)¶

Shows details for a user’s custom drink recipe

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.editAccount(request)¶

Form page where user can change account name, email, or password

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.editEmail(request)¶

Handle post requests for changing a user’s email

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.editPassword(request)¶

Handle post requests for changing a user’s password

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.editUsername(request)¶

Handle post requests for changing a user’s username

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.index(request)¶

Initial home search page of site

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.ingredientList(request)¶
DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.manage(request)¶

Account management page with buttons leading to aspects of a user’s account that they can view/change

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.newCustomDrink(request)¶

Show user’s custom drink recipes and option to add a new custom drink to the recipe list

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.recipeList(request)¶

User’s personal ingredient list page where they can add/remove new ingredients to their list

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.results(request)¶

Search results page shown when user inputs search ingredients

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.tagList(request, tagname)¶

Drink list showing drinks that have been given a particular tag

DrinkBeyondThePossible.views.viewFavoriteDrinks(request)¶

Show a user’s favorite drinks that they’ve saved from the site
